title: Move-In Procedures
description: Complete move-in information for new residents
subject: Welcome to {{building_name}} - Move-In Information
body:
Dear {{customer_name}},

Welcome to {{building_name}}! We're delighted to have you join our community.

**Move-In Checklist:**

1. **Building Access:**
   - Your access fob/key is ready for collection at the concierge desk
   - Building entry code: [To be provided upon collection]
   - Garage remote controls can be purchased for $50 each

2. **Move-In Booking:**
   - Please book the service elevator at least 48 hours in advance
   - Contact: [Building Manager] - [Phone Number]
   - A $500 refundable bond is required for elevator use

3. **Utilities & Services:**
   - Electricity and gas are your responsibility to connect
   - Internet/NBN connection details attached
   - Rubbish collection is Tuesday and Friday evenings

4. **Building Amenities:**
   - Gym access hours: 6 AM - 10 PM daily
   - Pool area: 7 AM - 9 PM
   - BBQ facilities available for booking

5. **Important Contacts:**
   - Building Manager: [Phone/Email]
   - Emergency Maintenance: [24/7 Number]
   - Concierge: [Phone Number]

6. **By-Laws & Rules:**
   - Quiet hours: 10 PM - 7 AM
   - Pet policy: [Details]
   - Parking regulations attached

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Welcome home!

Property Management Team

title: Noise Complaint Response
subject: Re: Noise Complaint - Unit {{customer_unit}}
body:
Dear {{customer_name}},

Thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We take all noise complaints seriously as we're committed to maintaining a peaceful living environment for all residents.

**Actions We're Taking:**

1. We have documented your complaint with the following details:
   - Date/Time: {{incident_datetime}}
   - Location: {{incident_location}}
   - Nature of disturbance: {{incident_description}}

2. We will:
   - Issue a formal notice to the resident(s) in question
   - Remind all residents of building quiet hours (10 PM - 7 AM)
   - Monitor the situation closely over the next 14 days
   - Follow up with you in one week to check on the situation

3. If the issue continues, please document:
   - Specific dates and times
   - Duration of the disturbance
   - Nature of the noise

**Building Quiet Hours:**
All residents are required to maintain reasonable noise levels, particularly between 10 PM and 7 AM on weekdays, and 11 PM to 8 AM on weekends.

We will keep you updated on our progress. Please contact us immediately if the issue escalates or continues.

Thank you for your patience.

Property Management Team

title: Parking Violation Notice
subject: Parking Violation Notice - {{vehicle_details}}
body:
Dear Resident,

We have received a report regarding a parking violation in our building:

**Violation Details:**
- Vehicle: {{vehicle_details}}
- Location: {{parking_location}}
- Date/Time: {{violation_datetime}}
- Violation Type: {{violation_type}}

**Parking Regulations:**
- Resident parking is permitted only in designated allocated spaces
- Visitor parking is limited to marked visitor bays (maximum 3 hours)
- Loading zones are for temporary use only (maximum 30 minutes)
- Fire zones and disabled bays must remain clear at all times
- Unauthorized vehicles may be towed at owner's expense

**Required Action:**
Please ensure your vehicle is parked in your allocated space immediately. Repeated violations may result in:
- Formal warnings
- Fines as per building by-laws
- Vehicle towing at owner's expense

If you believe this notice has been issued in error, please contact us within 48 hours with:
- Your unit number
- Vehicle registration
- Allocated parking space number

Thank you for your cooperation in maintaining fair parking access for all residents.

Property Management Team

title: By-Law Information
subject: Building By-Laws - {{building_name}}
body:
Dear {{customer_name}},

Thank you for your inquiry about our building by-laws.

**Key By-Laws:**

1. **Noise & Disturbances:**
   - Quiet hours: 10 PM - 7 AM (weekdays), 11 PM - 8 AM (weekends)
   - No loud music, parties, or construction during quiet hours
   - Residents must minimize impact noise (footsteps, moving furniture)

2. **Common Property:**
   - No items to be stored in hallways or common areas
   - Bicycles must be stored in designated areas only
   - No alterations to common property without approval

3. **Pets:**
   - All pets must be registered with building management
   - Dogs must be on leash in common areas
   - Owners must clean up after pets immediately
   - Excessive barking/noise from pets is not permitted

4. **Renovations:**
   - All renovations require prior approval
   - Work permitted Monday-Friday 8 AM - 5 PM, Saturday 9 AM - 4 PM
   - No renovations on Sundays or public holidays
   - Notification to neighbors required 7 days in advance

5. **Short-Term Letting:**
   - {{short_term_letting_policy}}

**Full By-Laws Document:**
A complete copy of the building by-laws is attached. You can also find them on our resident portal.

**Violations:**
By-law violations may result in warnings, fines, or legal action. Please ensure you're familiar with all applicable by-laws.

If you have questions about any specific by-law, please don't hesitate to ask.

Best regards,
Property Management Team
